com.github.mrm1st3r.util

Class BitmapUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrm1st3r.util.BitmapUtil

  • public final class BitmapUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides additional functions for bitmap processing. The methods decodeSampledBitmapFromResource(Resources, int, int, int) and calculateSamples(BitmapFactory.Options, int, int) are provided under creative commons 2.5 license by google at http://developer.android.com/training/displaying-bitmaps/load-bitmap.html The additional bitmapBuffer was added.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Google, Lukas 'mrm1st3r' Taake
